content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #249

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 43

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: FHIR Resource Access
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

With CDS Hooks, if the EHR wants to provide the CDS Service direct access to FHIR resources, the EHR creates an access token prior to invoking the CDS Service, passing this token to the CDS Service as part of the service call.

Comment:
Overlaps with intro, we should strive to present the same content only once in the document. We should reword this.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Agree with the sentiment, will look at a rewording

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #249

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 43

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: FHIR Resource Access

Existing Wording:

With CDS Hooks, if the EHR wants to provide the CDS Service direct access to FHIR resources, the EHR creates an access token prior to invoking the CDS Service, passing this token to the CDS Service as part of the service call.

Comment:
Overlaps with intro, we should strive to present the same content only once in the document. We should reword this.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #249

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Disposition Comment:
Agree with the sentiment, will look at a rewording

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
